comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This MiG-15bis ("Red 2057", c/n 2015357) was flown to Kimpo by North Korean defector No Kum-Sok. Among the very first American pilots to fly this MiG-15 and evaluate its performance was none other than US Air Force Test Pilot Chuck Yeager. See film here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0U6cVHOySo&feature=related The aircraft is now on exhibit at the National Museum of the US Air Force ("Air Force Museum") in Dayton, Ohio. See here: www.nationalmuseum.af.mil/factsheets/factsheet.asp?id=275 Photo Credit: US Air Force
